website_summaries.verdict: It has some good features but also some flaws.
pros: Rugged chrome vanadium shafts stand up to most jobs
Though only 7 pieces, the tools are versatile for numerous applications
cons: The handles are somewhat uncomfortable to hold and have a tendency to be slippery

customer_reviews.title: Funk-ugly but otherwise very nice!
customer_reviews.text: The color is gross and they look real icky as soon as you get them stained with black automotive grease and funk. The handles on the large ones are very comfortable, but the small ones not so much. (Am I the only one who doesn't understand why the handles are smaller on smaller screwdrivers? I mean, my hands don't change shape so why do the handles change shape?) They are strong little buggers and the metal cap means you can really whack them (or use them to whack something else) so I definitely recommend them. Ugly as they may be. :D
customer_reviews.author: Keith from GR

customer_reviews.title: Not at all durable don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. I bought these because of the good reviews about their strength and durability. They have no strength nor durability. I am not house handy but I do things to save the money of hiring someone. So I hardly ever use tools. When I do, I need the tools I have to stay sharp or whole. These wore down after one use on two screws. Can’t return them. Just another set to give away because they are useless to me now.
customer_reviews.author: KittyCaper

customer_reviews.title: Meticulous Builder Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. I threw away all the random screwdrivers I collected over the years and replaced them with these. I was tired of having missing screwdrivers and half of them having that weird smell the handles get when old. These things are great. Channellock is a well known company and you can feel the quality when you use them. The contoured handles are comfortable and I actually feel proud when I use them, even though that may sound funny. The price is great as well I would recommend them to friends so I def would recommend them to strangers.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE EVERYTHING ABOUT THESE
customer_reviews.text: Good quality screwdrivers, well made.. Price was good also..I like the color of them, they are easy to find in the tool box. It looks like they put a lot of thought into them. I think of all the times i wished i had a magnetic screwdriver...they are handy when putting in small screws. Channel-lock makes a good product. I normally buy Craftsman screwdrivers. Not many brands make the acrylic handles. To me they are a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph  Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Good value on a really nice set of tools
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap set of screwdrivers and thought I'd give these a try. I'd be willing to bet that you can't find a nicer set for this price. These things are amazing. The tips fit fasteners perfectly. Tools have a nice finish and feel sturdy. The handles are a little funky at first, but now that I'm used to them I actually prefer these over any of my other screwdrivers. The strike caps are handy for when you will undoubtedly use these as pry bars or chisels (I know, you're not supposed to, but we all do that). I would recommend these to anybody looking for an above average set of screwdrivers at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great screwdriver. Only 1 thing I'd change
customer_reviews.text: I'm a full time diesel tech and while I've only had these for a month I'm very impressed with them. I even used one of the flat heads as a pry bar (dont recommend) to get a transmission pan off and it didnt do any damage. My only suggestion/complaint is there really isnt a base on these. Meaning in my tool cart where you put drivers they kinda fall all over the place because theres not a flat base to sit on. Still recommend for a 22$ set of drivers!
customer_reviews.author: Kait_Manukainiu

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY if you do any work around  Electricity.
customer_reviews.text: The metal goes all the way through to the top. If you work with Electricity these may get you burned or killed. I work on equipment and cannot tale the chance of on having one in hand and touching something hot. So I gave them away instead of reboxing paying shipping driving to have them shipped...an waste of money for me...
customer_reviews.author: ADC224

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I really like Channellock's code blue stuff so I decided to order these screwdrivers and they are pretty good. I like that they are solid steel through the handle into the butt of the screwdriver in case you ever need to give them a gentle love tap with a hammer. The grip isnt as comfortable as I was expecting though but not bad. I do prefer my older craftsman handles over these but still not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Lason

customer_reviews.title: Really nice drivers, great handles
customer_reviews.text: I use wera at work, but I needed something for the house. I have always been a bit disappointed with how the tips on the Philips hold up on those, so I decided to take a shot in Channellock. This is a great set of drivers. The code blue handles are really well thought out and they seem very well made. Getting ready for a big car project, so time will tell how they hold up, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lee

customer_reviews.title: made in china
customer_reviews.text: Nice tools but I have 2 issues with them so far. 1 These are made in china. 2 They're a little large for most any type or work you would want to do with them. The 2 larger straight blade screw drives will are much to big for electrical work. Some things I like are the handles fit my larger hands pretty well. The back of the handle has a steel cap so that you can use them like a chisel .
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money & they’re comfy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I would use these for demolition jobs (it ring the end with hammer) but these are comfortable, fit in the hand nicely (I’m a woman with small hands) and are steel all the way through the handle. So no DO NOT use these for electrical work DIYers. But I think they’re an excellent buy for the money and they are comfortable. With part cushion part plastic handle for easy turning.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: too little and misunderstood information
customer_reviews.text: Was not what zi was expecting. Thought ALL WERE MAGNETIC screwdrivers. I should have read more carefully.. They are not made in USA AND SAYS THAT PRODUCT COULD CONTAIN LEAD! THANKS, BUT NO THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good magnet and the hard handle end is nice.
customer_reviews.text: Great screwdriver set. I only wish it had the stubby screwdrivers available in this set or even by this manufacturer so my set will all be the same. The solid metal end is really nice for those screws that are stubborn and you have to push down with one hand and turn with the other.
customer_reviews.author: dragon4785Top Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors
customer_reviews.text: These screwdrivers feel great in your hand and have a unique color that you can't miss. The biggest sizes are about as big as you will ever need. The grip/handle end of the screwdriver has a light but sturdy feel and appearance. However, the finish on the shaft/business end looks a little cheap, it appears that the metal was cast and then had the handles added without any polishing or finish applied to the metal. While the cast appearance implies less durability I have yet to have any flexing issues. The color is great and the sizes included cover all your simple bases. The ends fit screw heads well and don't slip. Overall I am very pleased with these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great screwdriver set.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a quality screwdriver set look no further. The tips are very durable and are magnetic which is very helpful in my line of work. I purchased these for one of my workers and he is very happy with them, the only thing I would change is the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Let be honest here most screw drivers become hammer or prydrivers. So far these are a great beater seat that i have in the grab box in the car. They have came in very handy so far. They even give you a vary large flat like they know your ganna abuse it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: good set
customer_reviews.text: If you do not have a set of screw drivers, this is a good start. They feel strong, when struck from top and the grip is excellent because of its shape. I was only a little disappointed with the quality. it just doesn't feel like a quality screwdriver in my hand. I think this is mostly because of the type of plastic they used on the handles. Overall excellent grip on the handle and on the tip.
customer_reviews.author: john p

customer_reviews.title: Proper screwdrivers!
customer_reviews.text: At first blush these seem to be excellent. Solidly built, perfect fit on the Philips heads and steel all the day to the hilt so they should be able to take a beating. Time will tell. The triangular handle is a little funky but I find it gives exceptional grip.
customer_reviews.author: baxkr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to set at work. I actually ended up buying another set for father in-law. They are easy to use in right spots and the magnetic end helps you keep the screw in places your fingers can’t reach. The grip fits well in your hand and the tips don’t brake easy like they do on some screw drivers. I would recommend this set to any technician.
customer_reviews.author: Dana English

customer_reviews.title: Great set for price!!
customer_reviews.text: im an automotive tech. and was looking for a good set of screwdrivers that didn't break the bank. I wasn't sure how good they would be, but I was quickly proven wrong for the doubt. They are sturdy durable and do not slip stripping out the inside. They have metal end caps that are labeled for easy identification. Overall I am very pleased with this set. only down side is the color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua t.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: He loves this set. They are durable and very sturdy. They also have magnetic tips, so for a good little set for your house tool box, we would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: SIMMONDS4

customer_reviews.title: Comes with #3 phillips.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard set. Simply works. Surprised how many other sets from other brands didnt come with a #3 phillips for larger screws like this one did. Only negative is wish it was made in USA instead of China.
customer_reviews.author: Alasvegas

customer_reviews.title: good set for the money and the at home mechanic
customer_reviews.text: good set for the money and the at home mechanic. Don't pry too hard on them the medium sized ones don't take much to bend. The big flathead is still taking a beating used few times with 8oz hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I give this set 5 stars! First the handles are different but i really like them. The finger slots make it eaiser to really tighten down a screw snug. I like the color to makes it easy to spot them in a pile of tools. Also the scredrivers seem to have some heft to them meaning stout and not cheap. I WOULD buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Whit n Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Huge Sized, Lifetime Set
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea these were so huge. I guess I didn’t read the description very carefully. They will last the rest of my life if I can keep track of them. You know how someone always wants to borrow tools, especially my kids.
customer_reviews.author: ArtsyLady

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set of screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: These screwdrivers are great in my opinion. They've held up nicely and they were decently priced. Not sure why more people dont use there.
customer_reviews.author: SnigglePits

customer_reviews.title: Heavy screwdriver set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my tool bag which I carry around extensively. I did not realize that they would be sooo heavy, probably due to the metal shank that goes thru the handle. Now I need to find a set of these that are lightweight and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: RichR49

customer_reviews.title: A very nice set that won’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: I got these because they’re solid from butt to tip, they look good, and they’re priced right. Definitely not intended for electrical use but they’ve worked great for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Glen R.

customer_reviews.title: Best set out there for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I work in industrial maintenance and use these every day. Love the marking on the top of the handle, makes it easy to pick the right one out of your bag. Great design overall and so far the best driver set I've used.
customer_reviews.author: C. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Occasional Use
customer_reviews.text: I have never used Channellock screwdriver before. I bought these for an occasional use / office tool bag. I was pleasantly surprised. I wouldn't buy these for my personal shop use as there are much better tools available.
customer_reviews.author: Dovetail

customer_reviews.title: Diffrent kind of grip
customer_reviews.text: So far so good iam heavy diesel mechanic. Wish it had come with a couple of stubbys.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremydcha

customer_reviews.title: Quality and all sizes I need
customer_reviews.text: Like the grips and uniqueness no question who’s tool box it needs to go back to
customer_reviews.author: Joel Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: I like the magnetic tips and color codes are easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the magnetic tips and color codes are easy to find. I didn't like that there was some plastic in the handle. Time will tell if they stand up to the wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Odvaha

customer_reviews.title: Super set to upgrade my hand tools
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of not being able to grab a good screwdriver .. well that is not problem now.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Awbrey

customer_reviews.title: The best screwdriver you will buy.
customer_reviews.text: I had to remove a mailbox that had been outside for 18 years. Got about 1/3 of the screws with much effort using my old Phillips head driver, but the rest wouldn't budge. Ordered a set of the Kraftform Plus and these Channellocks. (I was determined!) The Kraftform worked really well, and I got out or snapped the heads off all but 3 of the remaining screws. Enter the Channellocks: its big handle and amazing grip on the screws themselves allowed me to pop the remaining screws. I will keep this set til I die!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great Tools!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these. Love the strike plate on the end. I’ve been hard on my first set and they’ve all still better screw drivers then most you’ll buy. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great set of screw drivers
customer_reviews.text: These work absolutely great, I’ve been using them for a little under a month and they’ve been holding up to everything I throw at them, I’m a DIY mechanic and I use them regularly and they are very good, I’m sure these could hold up well for a beginner mechanic, I’d recommend these to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Kalvin Esteban-Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Strikeable
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find screw drivers with steel strikeable ends. Ordered a set for me and my brother
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Medley

customer_reviews.title: The handle and the metal end cap most important
customer_reviews.text: Good so far. But looks like they will be good
customer_reviews.author: larry rambo

customer_reviews.title: I was impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've used some of the other highly recommended screwdriver brands, but these are fantastic, especially for the price. I'm not even a Channellock fan (I don't like their pliers), but I like these.
customer_reviews.author: Codejack

customer_reviews.title: feels great in the hand
customer_reviews.text: nice bright color feels good in the hand strong and you will know your tools because not very one has these also works well and strong
customer_reviews.author: NBSS LLC

customer_reviews.title: The bright colors set them off very nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made screwdrivers. I love the color! Easy to spot on my toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R. Larson

customer_reviews.title: These screwdrivers are great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 3 sons for Christmas. They have used them constantly since the. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best value with rock solid dependability
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat these screwdrivers. They are made to take a beating and perform flawlessly. A++
customer_reviews.author: Preston Parker

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT,
customer_reviews.text: THE QUILITY WAS SO GOOD, I BOUGHT A 2ND SET.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Nice to use, under heavy use I've broken most of them within a year, but for the price and abuse I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Marques

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good set of screw drivers, name brand and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: mike d

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great set!! Fits my hand perfectly! Use them everyday for work and they never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome construction!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best screwdrivers I have used in years. I truly see them lasting me the rest of my life. Very heavy duty construction with metal through design. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Big G

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty set.
customer_reviews.text: I own a set of these and as a professional Mechanic I can say these are simply the best heavy-duty screw drivers around. Tough as nails and you get a set of tools you can pass to your children at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey a.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great screwdriver kit very comfortable well made much better than I expected for the price should last year's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. I use them daily and holding up to the abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Sm

customer_reviews.title: Love these screwdrivers!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product and price!!! The handles are amazing with the metal caps for hammering.
customer_reviews.author: Doogle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They feel great haven't had to use them much,time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Collins

customer_reviews.title: Best screwdriver set i have owned. Professional grade
customer_reviews.text: For the price this screwdriver set is the best! Good grip, like the metal piece on top and bits are strong and fit prefect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality set
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice screwdrivers - quality units. Sharp tips stay sharp, magnetized ends are a delight. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Despres

customer_reviews.title: No slip drivers
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to tools, so far so good. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: SteveGord

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST, I BOUGHT ME ONE AND ONE FOR MY BEST FRIEND. AS A PLUMBER I LIKED TOOLS TO MATCH, AND CHANNELLOCK BRAND FOR ME IS THE BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: not as good as i expected
customer_reviews.text: i bought these to replace a set of channel lock screwdrivers that have but used for years and wore out these are ok, i love my old set these seam cheaper made and have a round shaft that i hate the old ones have a hex shaft to get a wrench on, wrench hammer screwdriver comes in handy i wouldn't buy these again just because of that
customer_reviews.author: kinneman27

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid tool. Steel all the way through. Not for any type of electrical work. Automotive only.
customer_reviews.author: Jjack

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a #1 Philips but a great kit for the price
customer_reviews.author: Acdc

customer_reviews.title: Liked them so much I bought them twice
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for work. I liked them so much I bought them again for at home.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great screwdriver set, needed it to put up a ceiling fan, magnetic
customer_reviews.author: Dave Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: Dirtiest set in my tool box! (Because the are my first choice when I need a screw driver!)
customer_reviews.author: rambo

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by professionals
customer_reviews.text: My dad is a mechanical engineer and he uses these at work. So I know they're of professional grade quality. Now I got myself a set for home :)
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Durable all the way through.
customer_reviews.text: I had it at my last job and they were durable. had to leave them at my old job I started a new job and bought the exact same pair I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: These are made in CHINA, not Spain as a reviewer has suggested. Mine were returned.
customer_reviews.author: Seamus

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best set there is! This is my second purchase of the same set because I needed some for my personal use!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Withers

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These screwdrivers take a beating, used one to take out a bearing race and it cut the race instead of breaking
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Richards

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Best set of screwdrivers I have ever owned. This brand is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ivan Gamez

customer_reviews.title: Great grip
customer_reviews.text: Excellent screwdriver set. They have a unique grip and they are a full shaft. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice product at a good price. You can really beat on the end and not cause any damage. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product easy to spot in a messy tool box.
customer_reviews.author: elizandro a.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy these again.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Buy these and you will be too. Awesome feel in your hands, can take repeated hits With a hammer with no problems. I was looking for these months ago but the stores stopped selling them. Glad i found em. If you compare these to other sets at say menards or home depot, they are cheaper and more solid. Only thing is the magnet tips don't stay strong for to long but i think that's how all of those work.
customer_reviews.author: kris lamountain

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Use em at work almost everyday (Aviation mechanic) and I beat the hell out of them and they’re holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff  Schwanke

customer_reviews.title: Elite professional grade
customer_reviews.text: I have used many sets of screwdrivers over the years and these are the best that I have ever come into contact with. I had a full set of Milwaukee screwdrivers and a foreman had these. I bought them after using his. They look, feel, and perform better in every way. I consider my channellock wrench to be the best made tool in my bag and these would be a very close second, probably edged out only because there is no moving parts with these. One word of caution, all have steel all the way through the handle so not exactly recommended for any high voltage applications, where you should be using insulated tools anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Big River

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a little over a month. Not heavily used and tip already broke. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rodoburger

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Overall a goodset, they do well when abused as prying bars, chisels and such but the heads werent any better than the average tools I have always been using like Craftsmans.
customer_reviews.author: Avrohom

customer_reviews.title: Go-Thru steel blades screwdriver.
customer_reviews.text: These are greats screwdrivers with Go-Thru steel blades that I can use it to bang on even I'm not suppose to. The only problem is thatit s not made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Screwdriver

customer_reviews.title: Better then I expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Better then I expected for the price! I am very happy with the quality you won't find a better screwdriver set for the money
customer_reviews.author: Da

customer_reviews.title: They feel good and sturdy in your hand and are strong
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality screwdriver set. They feel good and sturdy in your hand and are strong. They have weight to them and I think they will last a long time if not forever. The color is great especially in my case since I work in a shop with many people and many tools, so there will be no mistaking who's tools these are. I will say the grip style might not be for everyone, but if you need to tighten very tightly the extra grip grooves helps out. Next time I shop for tools, I'll definitely consider channellock. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: pluggo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bright blue and red are great to identify tools, but will probably only use four of these.
customer_reviews.author: GruneMSU

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Bought this set to replace the same set I got 5 years ago. Used daily!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Broke with first use. Not Channellock quality I'm accustomed to. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: These are great. These are high quality screwdrivers and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. These are high quality screwdrivers and easy to grip, a smart addition to any toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley A. Gandee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very well made and holding up well in construction.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Moraca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price, quick delivery. My husband loves them and plans to buy additional sets!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Philips magnetic tip lost its magnetic super power after i punched it through sheetrock
customer_reviews.author: IT

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I love these screw drivers. I bought these for work and like them so much i'm hoping to get a set for home soon. Their strong and non slip. the shaft goes all the way through handle to the metal at the top of the handle so if you need to use the BFH to persuade a screw you're golden. If you are an electrician DO NOT BUY THESE. The handle is an insulator but the metal end is the same steel as the tip. I didn't stop to consider this when i was testing a hot wire on a lawn more the other day off the ignition coil. :)
customer_reviews.author: mrtwstrs

customer_reviews.title: im happy with them
customer_reviews.text: what can i say , run of the mill drivers with mag tips. im happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: tokyosmasher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have only used them several times but they are a solid set.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money.
customer_reviews.text: seems like a good set for the money, certainly you get what you pay for and i'd say that this set is a good value purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike1983

customer_reviews.title: OK Chinese screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: Usable screwdrivers for the garage. For me the handles are small, not a lot of leverage. The magnetic tips are strong enough to hold a screw. Finish on the handles is poor. Typical chinese product like you can pick up in harbor freight. Disappointed with channellock putting their name on these.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tools, great buy. non insulated so wouldn't use em on anything "hot"
customer_reviews.author: Roman Mironenko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set for the money! The only thing else I could ask for is the shank to have a hex bolster on it. Still a great set
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Solid...
customer_reviews.text: Contoured grips feel good in your hand, magnetic, plus steel end caps to bang on things with, everything you need in a good screwdriver!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Knight

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Brooke one already though. Hopefully it gets covered under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: sean hauck

customer_reviews.title: Second set of tools
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking for some tools I was really not too concerned about design and die cut. When you actually have to use those tools you'll learn quickly you don't want tools from Harbor Freight, but you also don't want to pay for tools from some other vendors. This is one of those sets that will make you happy. They don't chip and fall apart in the middle of job.
customer_reviews.author: Sevfen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I expected magnetic tip screwdrivers to hold the screws " firmly" They did not.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These screwdrivers are great they arrived on time and we're just as described
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chapman

product_meta.title: Channellock SD-7CB Magnetic Screwdriver Set (7 Piece) | Phillips and Slotted Screwdrivers with Go-Thru Steel Blades | High Torque, 3-sided CODE BLUE grips | Feature Laser Etched Steel Caps for Easy Identification
product_meta.description:
Size:1-PackNo home or garage is complete without a good, reliable screwdriver. Channellock screwdrivers are strong, versatile and ready to work.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Channellock SD-7CB Code Blue Screwdrivers 7 Piece Set includes one each S144CB, S146CB, S364CB, S388CB, P104CB, P204CB and P306CB Code Blue screwdrivers. Screwdriver with magnetic tips. Screwdrivers with Go-Thru steel blades for added strength. High torque, 3-sided Code Blue grips. Laser etched steel caps for easy identification. Screwdrivers made to A.N.S.I. standards in China.
feature_bullets: Set includes: 1/4"x4", 1/4"x6", 3/16"x4", 3/8"X8" Slotted & 1x4", 2x4", 3x6" Phillips Code blue screwdrivers
Screwdrivers with go-thru steel blades for added strength
Laser etched steel caps for easy identification
